subject: XercesImpl.jar and XMLJUnitResultFormatter
msgSnippet: All, I am currently testing a project by executing TestCase classes using an ant JUnit task.  One test case class makes use of JaxRPC and requires
messageBody:
All,



I am currently testing a project by executing TestCase classes using an
ant JUnit task. One test case class makes use of JaxRPC and requires
XercesImpl.jar for execution. When I add XercesImpl.jar to the running
classpath, I receive the following exception during test execution (I
apologize for the long stack trace, but I wanted to get the meat of it
in there - it's at the bottom of this message). The java process
executing the tasks hangs after printing this stack trace and never
seems to return.



I have ensure that the xercesImpl.jar within ant's lib directory matches
the one in my classpath (I copied it over my existing JAR). I've also
tried adding ant's version to the running classpath. The fact that
there are two copies of the JAR does not seem to be the problem.



[junit] java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError:
